website_summaries.verdict: This easy-to-clean model can handle both small canning projets and hearty family dinners.
pros: 10-quart pressure canner/cooker made from durable 18/10 steel
Safe for use with glass and ceramic stoves
Knob can be removed for cleaning
cons: Handles are loose, allowing steam to leak
Tightening with a screwdriver may help

customer_reviews.title: This pressure cooker appears to be well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: One thing I’ve learned from ordering items online is to test them right after they are received. This pressure cooker leaked around the point where the handle attaches to the lid. Water dribbled out onto the stovetop as pressure built. Once I saw where the water and steam were coming from I released the steam and took the lid off. There are two phillips screws that secure the handle to the lid. I tightened both screws and retested. This time the cooker held pressure without leaking. I really didn’t want to go through the hassle of returning the cooker. Will provide additional feedback going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Al Gorithm

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box, carefully took the Pressure Cooker out of the plastic cover and a nut falls out. It took me a few minutes to figure out where the nut came from. It engages the screw that secures the handle to the cover. I will be returning the product. I'm not sure where this is made and it could be that I got the one bad part. Quality control is mandatory and this delineates a lack of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautifully crafted piece. The weight distribution with the extra handle is balanced. When I browned onions, they cooked evenly. The locking feature has an audible click to let me know I'm ready to cook. What I don't like is the plastic. It doesn't give me confidence that it was built to last. Time will tell ...
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Its our favorite kitchen item now (up there with our cast iron pans and Victornix chef knife!). Good weight means nice sauteeing before adding liquids. Very happy with it - have made about 10 recipes in the last 3 weeks and all have come out great - everything from bone broth to soups, and stews.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves his "New Toy"
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, his "new toy". He loves it and says it is one of his favorite cooking tools! Works like a charm, quality construction, beautiful product. Good price for the money. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: MJ's Oven

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great and performs well too. Glad I didn’t spend the extra money for competitors brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Missing Safety Valve
customer_reviews.text: My 10qt stainless steel pressure cooker did not include the safety valve...That's the MOST IMPORTANT PART! It was just an exposed metal rod where the safety valve should sit. Looked all around the box and inside the pressure cooker to make sure it wasn't just floating around in there. No Safety Valve at all. I'm glad I have the option to return, even though it's a complete waste of time. i'm hesitant to re-order the same item in fear of wasting MORE time. I think i'll choose another brand/vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: Do not have to worry about aluminum since this is a stainless steel pressure cooker. it works great for delicious meals
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile pressure cooker/canner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to pressure can vegetables. It worked great for that project. I also use it as a pressure cooker and it has worked well for that also.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with product quality !
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in December 2019, I used it only 3 times and the handle is loosening. 02/03/2020
customer_reviews.author: Jean Louis Machado

customer_reviews.title: Wow, it really cooks fast.
customer_reviews.text: So far I cooked chicken and beef stew. Cooking times are fast, so watch out as you can totally over cook a whole chicken. Lid was not super secure and had a little play but once the pressure cooker got up to temperature the lid was super secure. Great thick base for browning and cleans up easy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Vagnini

customer_reviews.title: SOOO FAST AND EASY!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product & it's made in the USA! Don't hesitate to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ALENE

customer_reviews.title: Great Pressure Cooker
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice clean pressure cooker then when running properly is very quiet even with full pressure. I love my unit and use it at least once every other week likely more often Soon.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Byers

customer_reviews.title: Great cook pit
customer_reviews.text: Had seen my mother use one when I was young. What an amazing cooking device. Love the time saving on cooking items. Well built and good quality
customer_reviews.author: U

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Pressure value broke afternoon a 8 months of usage. Used a total of 14 times. Will not hold pressure, leaks. Not worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is safe and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously it's used in my kitchen where I cook everyday. This product is very useful, sorry I did not purchase the bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline Smart Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, there are also some videos on YouTube showing you how. It feels and looks as best quality
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to use it as soon as you get it
customer_reviews.text: Product is not working properly. The seal seems to be defective but unfortunately I waited too long to use it and missed the return period for 3 days 😬
customer_reviews.author: Felicita Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great cooker
customer_reviews.text: Great pressure cooker. Only problem is the lock broke within a month of using it. But contacted company and they sent a replace part immediately and hassle free.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Zavor Pressure Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and I feel very safe using this pressure cooker. Made my firs pot roast the other day and it turned out very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For smaller canning perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend, she has already been canning with it , small batches
customer_reviews.author: dianna

customer_reviews.title: ZAVOR PRESSURE COOKER
customer_reviews.text: I have been using pressure cooker all my life. This Zavor is one of the best that I have used.
customer_reviews.author: J. Peter Hall

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Never used a Pressure cooker before now and use it all the time. If you enjoy cooking you like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Piece
customer_reviews.text: Had a broken piece out of the box for the locking mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hartzell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this pressure cooker is great. I use it all the time and have never had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be afraid to use this cooker
customer_reviews.text: I love this pressure cooker. I have the Fago one ( this is the American version) and this one is even easier to use. I made 2 corned beefs in it so far. I made one and then the second one. It took me about 3 hours total with bringing down the pressure and then back up again for the second one. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Anderko

customer_reviews.title: defective seal
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product occasionally for 5 months since May 2020. I did not notice a problem at first but for the last several times I used it, the pot did not seal adequately and the pot burned. I will have to go to the company and hope they will replace at least the rubber seal.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, well made
customer_reviews.text: After 40 years, I finally replaced my pressure cooker. The ZAVOR Duo works beautifully, is easy to clean, just a good solid cooking pot. I can brown in it, then use the pressure feature. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sloughgirl

customer_reviews.title: Better than the old rocker style.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use, after a little learning curve. I like it a lot and use it all the time. I make a bone broth in 2-3 hours, instead of what used to be an all day project.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Changed my cooking style
customer_reviews.text: My mom had the old rocker for the top that danced crazy with high steam. This has a safety element that makes cooking easy and fun. The flavors are incredible and meals are quickly served! I use this pressure cooker at least twice a week. It is well constructed and a beautiful display.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new pressure cooker!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described with speedy shipping. It works just like America's Test Kitchen says it would. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Julane Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: not good quality
customer_reviews.text: steam is coming out from everywhere. water is dripping and makes mess. I'm going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sayuri

customer_reviews.title: It came without the regulator valve.
customer_reviews.text: It was missing the regulator valve. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Good pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I have is that is a pressure cooker canner and and a canning rack did not come with the cooker.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: PowerHouse cook pot for families.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the money. Used to take hours to cook a pot of beans, now done in under an hour. Read instructions experiment and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Hoss

product_meta.title: Zavor DUO 10 Quart Multi-Setting Pressure Cooker and Canner with Recipe Book and Steamer Basket - Polished Stainless Steel (ZCWDU04)
feature_bullets: Named “Best Buy” pressure cooker by America’s Test Kitchen and “Best of the Test” of stove-top pressure cookers by a leading culinary magazine
Constructed of 18/10 stainless steel and compatible with all domestic stoves including gas, electric, ceramic and induction

The DUO is equipped with the highest standard in safety systems that have been tested and approved in the US by UL laboratories. The automatic locking handle will securely lock the lid into place when closed

Intuitive pressure regulator knob with a “HIGH” (15psi) pressure position, a “LOW” (8psi) pressure position, a “Release” position that automatically releases pressure after cooking and a “Clean” position to remove the knob for cleaning. When Pressure Canning, a single pressure level of 15psi will be mantained, that allows to reach the temperature needed to safely preserve low acid foods

Includes a 10Qt Stove-top Pressure Cooker & Canner that fits up to Three (3) 1Qt Mason Jars or up to Four (4) Pint Mason Jars (jars and canning accessories not included), Stainless Steel Steamer Basket, Quick Guide, User’s Manual and Recipe Book with over 50 recipes. The unit does not include a pressure gauge | 10-year warranty -> register on zavoramerica website, details on user manual

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars149 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
